name: John K. SPHAR, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of September, 2005, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

881 A.2d 1261
